website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung 16mm f/2.4 Ultra Wide Pancake NX Lens is a small, fast, wide-angle lens, but it's a bit pricey and shows soft corners at its widest aperture.

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchasing compared to the kit lens
customer_reviews.text: I shoot a great deal of landscape photography and bought this to use with my new NX3000, which has a kit lens of 16-55mm. I think this lens was worth purchasing compared to the kit lens though, even though it's not any wider than what the kit offers. The quality seems a little better, it's a little smaller (feeling balanced on the camera), and the ability to use it in low light (including indoors and for street photography) is a big plus. I liked it enough that I almost immediately ordered the 30mm pancake, and don't see myself using the kit lens much if ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Petrison

customer_reviews.title: You can shoot milky way
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for shooting the night sky and it works perfectly. I could take starly night sky at the camping site, even milky way. I'm very happy with this.

customer_reviews.title: Handles low light great!
customer_reviews.text: Handles low lights well, takes clear, vivid images. Not as wide as I wanted and had to buy the 12-24 to get the ultra wide angle but still a great performing lens. It's lightweight and smaller size make it a nice overall lens. One of my favorite lenses and I would recommend unless you need really wide angle. The 10mm will fisheye, the 12-24mm is ultra wide, this 16mm is wide angle, not ultra wide as Samsung claims.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly softer corners wide open, but still sharp enough, worth also considering 16-50PZ
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great lens and feels significantly wider than the 20-50mm kit lens at 20mm. I saw some reports of slightly less sharp edges with this lens, which I was able to see a little bit in some test shots, but with normal photos of real subjects, I haven't found it to be an issue. The sharpness is still pretty high even on the edges. Note that now that the 16-50mm power zoom lens is available, that lens is worth considering as an alternative to this lens, since it has OS and comparable aperture at 16mm (3.5 vs. 2.8). I don't own that one so I can't compare directly.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, wide shots, dramatic (wide) selfies.
customer_reviews.text: One of my 2 favorite NX Series Lenses (I also love the 45mm 2d/3d) If you center subjects to avoid face/body distortion - this lens can be surprisingly versatile (travel/events/dramatic wide portraits, group photos). I use it with my NX300m and it's always in my bag or on my camera only ever being switched with the 45mm 2d/3d (which I use for portraits). I've tried other NX lenses, and this is definitely my favorite for traveling. I've also (unashamedly) found this to be the best lens for selfies due to it's wide angle and light weight!

customer_reviews.title: Best companion to the nx300
customer_reviews.text: Go to lens for my nx300. I used this primarily as my walk around lens regardless is it is prime lens. It is lightweight and small and doesn't add much size unlike the kit 18-55mm lens. It is also sharp with fast autofocus. I don't need bring the kit zoom lens because the 16mm is so sharp, cropping is sufficient. This lens works well even in low light situations. Our house doesn't have proper lighting but I can still fire off some nice pictures with minimal noise. The 16mm is fairly wide which allows some nice landscape photos and the ability to do subject isolation a prime lens. This is a must have for the samsung nx systems.

product_meta.title: Samsung NX 16mm f/2.4 Camera Lens (Black) - Fixed
product_meta.description:
The bright and slim Samsung 16mm wide angle pancake lens will allow you to capture exceptional images, even in low-light situations. Optimized for breathtaking scenery and everyday snapshots, the 16mm wide pancake lens provides deeper depth of field with a maximum aperture of f2.4. The intuitive i-Function feature gives users one-touch access to all your camera's manual settings. Adjust the aperture, shutter speed and more with just a twist of the lens while previewing the image in real-time. Plus since it's incredibly slim and lightweight, you can take it with you anywhere. This 16mm f2.4 lens is compatible with all Samsung NX Compact System Cameras.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The portable and convenient Samsung EX-W16NBUS 16mm NX i-Function pancake lens is an all-purpose ultra-wide lens that works with Samsung NX mount cameras. The lens has a fast maximum aperture of F/2.4 for sharp shots even in low-light situations. Featuring Samsung's intuitive i-Function, it gives you quick and easy access to manual settings, so you get exactly the shot you want.

i-Function offers one-touch access to your camera's manual settings. View larger.

Fixed 16mm focal length offers versatility with a fast maximum aperture for sharp shots--even in low-light situations. View larger.

16MM ULTRA-WIDE FOCAL LENGTH AND FAST F/2.4 APERTURE
The lens has a fixed 16mm (equivalent to 24.6mm in 35mm format) focal length that offers great versatility. A fast F/2.4 maximum aperture and a fast shutter speed let you capture bright images in low-light situations without a tripod. The lens is ideal for wide landscapes and for creating dramatic background blur. 

ONE-TOUCH ACCESS TO CONTROLS WITH I-FUNCTION
Samsung's i-Function feature gives you easy one-touch access to your camera's manual settings. You'll be able to adjust shutter speed, aperture, and more with just a push of a button and twist of the lens. You'll even be able to preview the settings in real time, so you can see how the settings affect your shot before you take it. Whether you're an expert or enthusiast, the intuitive i-Function feature will give you professional results. 

COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT FOR CARRYING EVERYWHERE
The EX-W16NBUS is incredibly compact, making it a great walk-around lens for the photographer who needs flexibility and portability. The compact size preserves the slim profile of NX series cameras, and the weight of less than 3 ounces means it's comfortable to carry. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung EX-W16NBUS 16mm pancake lens for NX mount cameras.
